H0.text: who helped them recapture mycenae once they were old enough to fight. Orestes' Uncle, Strophius

H1.text: who helped them recapture mycenae once they were old enough to fight. King Tyndareus

H2.text: who helped them recapture mycenae once they were old enough to fight. Pylades

H3.text: who helped them recapture mycenae once they were old enough to fight. Aegisthus

A4.text: With the help of King Tyndareus of Sparta, the Atreids drove Thyestes again into exile.

A5.text: Aegisthus, the son of Thyestes, killed Atreus and restored Thyestes to the throne.
